lessons.japanese: そんな発言はいかにも彼らしい。
lessons.english: Such words are so typical for him.

lessons.japanese: そんな事を言うとはいかにも彼らしい。
lessons.english: It is typical of him to say such a thing.

lessons.japanese: そんなふるまいをするなんていかにも彼らしい。
lessons.english: It's characteristic of him to behave like that.

lessons.japanese: そんなことをするとはいかにも彼らしい。
lessons.english: It is characteristic of him to do such a thing.

lessons.japanese: それは、いかにも彼らしい。
その意見はいかにも彼らしい。
lessons.english: The idea is typical of him.

lessons.japanese: そのような行ないはいかにもメグらしい。
lessons.english: Such behavior is just like Meg.

lessons.japanese: そうしたしゃべりかたはいかにも彼らしい。
lessons.english: That way of talking is typical of him.

lessons.japanese: こんなおふざけはいかにもベーカー氏らしい。
lessons.english: Such playfulness is characteristic of Mr Baker.

lessons.japanese: いかにもビルのやりそうなことだ。
いかにもリゾートってかんじの格好ね。
lessons.english: Your clothes say "vacation resort" to me.

lessons.japanese: あのスーツはいかにも高そうだ。
lessons.english: That suit has an expensive look.

lessons.japanese: いかにも敬虔なるクリスチャンが送る、礼節重き言葉です。
lessons.english: So characteristic of what a pious Christian would say, this courteous phrase.
